name: AmbientStormSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open ambient storm sounds”
”Alexa ask ambient storm sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambient storm sounds
des:
Let the sounds of an ambient storm raging outside thrust you into a deep sleep. Ambient Storm Sounds is the ultimate science-backed companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Ambient Storm Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
